physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains a copy of a letter that was sent from the Persian Gulf Residency in Bahrain to the Secretary of State for Commonwealth Relations and the Political Agencies in Bahrain and Muscat. The letter reports a visit made to Bahrain by Feroz Khan Noon, a Pakistani politician who had recently been appointed Pakistan's special envoy to Saudi Arabia and the Islamic World.
